pr_title: Add sticks recipe to table saw

timeline.bodyText: Instead of flling the guide wth the same recipe maybe add a dummy plank representing all planks and have its display name as "Any Wooden Plank"

replies.bodyText: Should I also do that for logs / stripped logs then, @LinoxGH?

timeline.message: Remove redundant if-else && Consume item after output

timeline.bodyText: I think this should be put into a seperate method returning a nullable ItemStack.

timeline.bodyText: Why aren't you adding all planks directly instead of this weird placeholder?

replies.bodyText: I dont know who it was but someone told me that this was better, I had it for each item at the start and changed it to this

timeline.bodyText: There isn't really any need for these two variables, just do it inside the if-statement directly.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Just do a return; here, no need to assign a variable.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Just do a return; here, no need to assign a variable.

timeline.message: Refactor + undo placeholder item in displayrecipes

timeline.bodyText: Never call Optional#get() without doing Optional#ifPresent() first.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: Just a general thought: Should we maybe send a message or play a sound effect here?
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText:
Play a sound when the output is null you mean?
What sound, though?
replies.author: svr333

replies.bodyText:
Just an indicator that this item couldn't be used, either some sound that conveys "failure" XD, maybe smoke particles or just the usual "not a valid recipe" message.
It's just a general idea.
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit
